attributes.action: raise ratings for films according to content
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In modern society 12A films contain both foul language and excessive violence. Everyday we see in the news our young people being involved in crime. Surely we do not want to encourage our young people to act like this. Please sign this petition if you dont agree with films promoting crime and foul language to our young people.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
